trans-unit.source: Update a live tile from a background task
trans-unit.target: Update a live tile from a background task

trans-unit.source: Use a background task to update your app's live tile with fresh content.
trans-unit.target: Use a background task to update your app's live tile with fresh content.

trans-unit.source: Update a live tile from a background task
trans-unit.target: Update a live tile from a background task

trans-unit.source: \[ Updated for UWP apps on Windows 10.
trans-unit.target: \[ Updated for UWP apps on Windows 10.

trans-unit.source: For Windows 8.x articles, see the [archive](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?linkid=619132) \]
trans-unit.target: For Windows 8.x articles, see the [archive](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?linkid=619132) \]

trans-unit.source: Important APIs
trans-unit.target: Important APIs

trans-unit.source: IBackgroundTask
trans-unit.target: IBackgroundTask

trans-unit.source: BackgroundTaskBuilder
trans-unit.target: BackgroundTaskBuilder

trans-unit.source: Use a background task to update your app's live tile with fresh content.
trans-unit.target: Use a background task to update your app's live tile with fresh content.

trans-unit.source: Here's a video that shows how to add live tiles to your apps.
trans-unit.target: Here's a video that shows how to add live tiles to your apps.

trans-unit.source: One Dev Minute - Updating a live tile from a background task
trans-unit.target: One Dev Minute - Updating a live tile from a background task

trans-unit.source: Create the background task project
trans-unit.target: Create the background task project

trans-unit.source: To enable a live tile for your app, add a new Windows Runtime Component project to your solution.
trans-unit.target: To enable a live tile for your app, add a new Windows Runtime Component project to your solution.

trans-unit.source: This is a separate assembly that the OS loads and runs in the background when a user installs your app.
trans-unit.target: This is a separate assembly that the OS loads and runs in the background when a user installs your app.

trans-unit.source: In Solution Explorer, right-click the solution, point to **Add**, and click or tap **New Project**.
trans-unit.target: In Solution Explorer, right-click the solution, point to **Add**, and click or tap **New Project**.

trans-unit.source: In the **Add New Project** dialog, select the **Windows Runtime Component** template in the **Visual C# > Windows Store** section.
trans-unit.target: In the **Add New Project** dialog, select the **Windows Runtime Component** template in the **Visual C# > Windows Store** section.

trans-unit.source: Name the project BackgroundTasks and click or tap **OK**.
trans-unit.target: Name the project BackgroundTasks and click or tap **OK**.

trans-unit.source: Microsoft Visual Studio adds the new project to the solution.
trans-unit.target: Microsoft Visual Studio adds the new project to the solution.

trans-unit.source: In the main project, add a reference to the BackgroundTasks project.
trans-unit.target: In the main project, add a reference to the BackgroundTasks project.

trans-unit.source: Implement the background task
trans-unit.target: Implement the background task

trans-unit.source: Implement the [**IBackgroundTask**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/br224794) interface to create a class that updates your app's live tile.
trans-unit.target: Implement the [**IBackgroundTask**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/br224794) interface to create a class that updates your app's live tile.

trans-unit.source: Your background work goes in the Run method.
trans-unit.target: Your background work goes in the Run method.

trans-unit.source: In this case, the task gets a syndication feed for the MSDN blogs.
trans-unit.target: In this case, the task gets a syndication feed for the MSDN blogs.

trans-unit.source: To prevent the task from closing prematurely while asynchronous code is still running, get a deferral.
trans-unit.target: To prevent the task from closing prematurely while asynchronous code is still running, get a deferral.

trans-unit.source: In Solution Explorer, rename the automatically generated file, Class1.cs, to BlogFeedBackgroundTask.cs.
trans-unit.target: In Solution Explorer, rename the automatically generated file, Class1.cs, to BlogFeedBackgroundTask.cs.

trans-unit.source: In BlogFeedBackgroundTask.cs, replace the automatically generated code with the stub code for the **BlogFeedBackgroundTask** class.
trans-unit.target: In BlogFeedBackgroundTask.cs, replace the automatically generated code with the stub code for the **BlogFeedBackgroundTask** class.

trans-unit.source: In the Run method implementation, add code for the **GetMSDNBlogFeed** and **UpdateTile** methods.
trans-unit.target: In the Run method implementation, add code for the **GetMSDNBlogFeed** and **UpdateTile** methods.

trans-unit.source: Set up the package manifest
trans-unit.target: Set up the package manifest

trans-unit.source: To set up the package manifest, open it and add a new background task declaration.
trans-unit.target: To set up the package manifest, open it and add a new background task declaration.

trans-unit.source: Set the entry point for the task to the class name, including its namespace.
trans-unit.target: Set the entry point for the task to the class name, including its namespace.

trans-unit.source: In Solution Explorer, open Package.appxmanifest.
trans-unit.target: In Solution Explorer, open Package.appxmanifest.

trans-unit.source: Click or tap the **Declarations** tab.
trans-unit.target: Click or tap the **Declarations** tab.

trans-unit.source: Under **Available Declarations**, select **BackgroundTasks** and click **Add**.
trans-unit.target: Under **Available Declarations**, select **BackgroundTasks** and click **Add**.

trans-unit.source: Visual Studio adds **BackgroundTasks** under **Supported Declarations**.
trans-unit.target: Visual Studio adds **BackgroundTasks** under **Supported Declarations**.

trans-unit.source: Under **Supported task types**, ensure that **Timer** is checked.
trans-unit.target: Under **Supported task types**, ensure that **Timer** is checked.

trans-unit.source: Under **App settings**, set the entry point to **BackgroundTasks.BlogFeedBackgroundTask**.
trans-unit.target: Under **App settings**, set the entry point to **BackgroundTasks.BlogFeedBackgroundTask**.

trans-unit.source: Click or tap the **Application UI** tab.
trans-unit.target: Click or tap the **Application UI** tab.

trans-unit.source: Set **Lock screen notifications** to **Badge and Tile Text**.
trans-unit.target: Set **Lock screen notifications** to **Badge and Tile Text**.

trans-unit.source: Set a path to a 24x24 pixel icon in the **Badge logo** field.
trans-unit.target: Set a path to a 24x24 pixel icon in the **Badge logo** field.

trans-unit.source: **Important** This icon must use monochrome and transparent pixels only.
trans-unit.target: **Important** This icon must use monochrome and transparent pixels only.

trans-unit.source: In the **Small logo** field, set a path to a 30x30 pixel icon.
trans-unit.target: In the **Small logo** field, set a path to a 30x30 pixel icon.

trans-unit.source: In the **Wide logo** field, set a path to a 310x150 pixel icon.
trans-unit.target: In the **Wide logo** field, set a path to a 310x150 pixel icon.

trans-unit.source: Register the background task
trans-unit.target: Register the background task

trans-unit.source: Create a [**BackgroundTaskBuilder**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/br224768) to register your task.
trans-unit.target: Create a [**BackgroundTaskBuilder**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/br224768) to register your task.

trans-unit.source: **Note** Starting in Windows 8.1, background task registration parameters are validated at the time of registration.
trans-unit.target: **Note** Starting in Windows 8.1, background task registration parameters are validated at the time of registration.

trans-unit.source: An error is returned if any of the registration parameters are invalid.
trans-unit.target: An error is returned if any of the registration parameters are invalid.

trans-unit.source: Your app must be able to handle scenarios where background task registration fails - for example, use a conditional statement to check for registration errors and then retry failed registration using different parameter values.
trans-unit.target: Your app must be able to handle scenarios where background task registration fails - for example, use a conditional statement to check for registration errors and then retry failed registration using different parameter values.

trans-unit.source: In your app's main page, add the **RegisterBackgroundTask** method and call it in the **OnNavigatedTo** event handler.
trans-unit.target: In your app's main page, add the **RegisterBackgroundTask** method and call it in the **OnNavigatedTo** event handler.

trans-unit.source: Debug the background task
trans-unit.target: Debug the background task

trans-unit.source: To debug the background task, set a breakpoint in the task’s Run method.
trans-unit.target: To debug the background task, set a breakpoint in the task’s Run method.

trans-unit.source: In the **Debug Location** toolbar, select your background task.
trans-unit.target: In the **Debug Location** toolbar, select your background task.

trans-unit.source: This causes the system to call the Run method immediately.
trans-unit.target: This causes the system to call the Run method immediately.

trans-unit.source: Set a breakpoint in the task’s Run method.
trans-unit.target: Set a breakpoint in the task’s Run method.

trans-unit.source: Press F5 or tap **Debug > Start Debugging** to deploy and run the app.
trans-unit.target: Press F5 or tap **Debug > Start Debugging** to deploy and run the app.

trans-unit.source: After the app launches, switch back to Visual Studio.
trans-unit.target: After the app launches, switch back to Visual Studio.

trans-unit.source: Ensure that the **Debug Location** toolbar is visible.
trans-unit.target: Ensure that the **Debug Location** toolbar is visible.

trans-unit.source: It's on the **View > Toolbars** menu.
trans-unit.target: It's on the **View > Toolbars** menu.

trans-unit.source: On the **Debug Location** toolbar, click the **Suspend** dropdown and select **BlogFeedBackgroundTask**.
trans-unit.target: On the **Debug Location** toolbar, click the **Suspend** dropdown and select **BlogFeedBackgroundTask**.

trans-unit.source: Visual Studio suspends execution at the breakpoint.
trans-unit.target: Visual Studio suspends execution at the breakpoint.

trans-unit.source: Press F5 or tap **Debug > Continue** to continue running the app.
trans-unit.target: Press F5 or tap **Debug > Continue** to continue running the app.

trans-unit.source: Press Shift+F5 or tap **Debug > Stop Debugging** to stop debugging.
trans-unit.target: Press Shift+F5 or tap **Debug > Stop Debugging** to stop debugging.

trans-unit.source: Return to the app's tile on the Start screen.
trans-unit.target: Return to the app's tile on the Start screen.

trans-unit.source: After a few seconds, tile notifications appear on your app's tile.
trans-unit.target: After a few seconds, tile notifications appear on your app's tile.
